description: Set up global configurations for Safety CLI, including proxy settings and organization details.

options.description: Choose the proxy protocol to be saved into Safety's configuration file (default: https).
options.name: --proxy-protocol

options.description: Specify a proxy host for network communications to be saved into Safety's configuration.
options.name: --proxy-host

options.description: Set the proxy port to be saved into Safety's configuration file (default: 80).
options.name: --proxy-port

options.description: Set the timeout duration for proxy network calls.
options.name: --proxy-timeout

options.description: Enable or disable the requirement for a proxy in network communications
options.name: --proxy-required

options.description: Set the current device with an organization ID.
options.name: --organization-id

options.description: Set the current device with an organization name.
options.name: --organization-name

options.description: The project development stage to be tied to the current device.
options.name: --stage

options.description: Save the configuration to a system config file.
options.name: --save-to-system
